description: This table stores appointment request information for home health/hospice initial and resumption visit scheduling.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the care plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: REG_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item stores the CSN of the Home Health/Hospice Admission or ROC Planning encounter that generated the appointment requests.

columns.name: APPT_REQ_DISCIPLINE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the home care discipline associated with the appointment request order for the CSN.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: APPT_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: Stores the appointment request ORD associated with the CSN

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: Stores the referral (RFL) ID that associated with the appointment request ORD for the line.

columns.name: LCP_APPT_REQ_SUG_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status associated with this appointment request suggestion. Categories can be found in I ECT 15520.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Suggested By System


Deferred by user


Not a suggestion - created by user


Confirmed to Request

columns.name: SUG_EDITED_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether an appointment request suggestion was edited by an end user. Backing category list is ECT 101.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SUG_RULE_ID
columns.description: Denotes which CER rule was used to create this appointment request suggestion.

columns.name: SUG_PRC_ID
columns.description: Stores the appointment request suggestion visit type. Networked to PRC.

columns.name: SUG_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the target range of this visit within the appointment request suggestion.

columns.name: SUG_END_DATE
columns.description: The end date of the target range of this visit within the appointment request suggestion.

columns.name: SUG_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Appointment notes for this visit within the appointment request suggestion.
